title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Designing Instructional Strategies for Transitioning Anatomy Laboratories to Online Platforms

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anatomy knowledge and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain four core elements (instructor presence, social interaction, cognitive engagement, technological accessibility) to consider when designing online anatomy practicums using the Delphi technique.
Learners can design an evaluation plan for the effectiveness of online anatomy practicals by applying mixed research methods.
Learners can develop three guidelines for creating anatomy practical content optimized for mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
